name: Condition of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field: FY 2021
description: Condition of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_nasf_millions_a
variableMeasured.unitText: Net assignable square feet in millions and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_condition_nasf_superior
variableMeasured.unitText: Net assignable square feet in millions and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_condition_nasf_satisfactory
variableMeasured.unitText: Net assignable square feet in millions and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_condition_nasf_requires_renovations

variableMeasured.name: field_condition_nasf_requires_replacement

notes: Details may not add to totals due to rounding. Condition was assessed relative to the usage of the current research program.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities, FY 2021.
